This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=BOUNDARYOBJECTS.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2014-07-21T08:22:47Z Amy Jane Barnes 2014-07-21T10:22:38+01:00 2014-07-21T10:22:38+01:00 Boundary Objects - launched and accepting members! https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BOUNDARYOBJECTS;927c953e.1407 Dear all,<br><br>I am delighted to confirm that Boundary Objects has launched today and we're accepting members to the network!<br><br>http://www.boundaryobjects.org/<br><br>Looking forward to meeting you online soon.<br><br>Best wishes,<br><br>Amy Michele Nicole Robinson 2014-06-05T18:04:39+00:00 2014-06-05T18:04:39+00:00 CFP: RSA Transition and Transformation in the Early Modern Italian Home https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BOUNDARYOBJECTS;7d8e2e86.1406 There is space for one panelist on the RSA 2015 (Berlin) panel: Transition and Transformation in the Early Modern Italian Home<http://www.rsa.org/blogpost/1134779/186722/Transition-and-Transformation-in-the-Early-Modern-Italian-Home> (deadline 9 June 2014):<br><br>Although the early modern Italian home provided a setting for the transmission of longstanding traditions, rituals and memories, it was also a site of transition and transformation. Interactions between people, spaces, objects and images both marked and facilitated the entry and exit of residents, movement through various life stages and changing relationships between family members. The shifting spiritual, social and physical needs of the family also effected change in the material and visual culture of [...]
